Description
===========
  EnumDevices illustrates how to enumerate the DirectSound and 
  DirectSoundCapture devices.

Path
====
  Source: Mssdk\Samples\Multimedia\DSound\Src\EnumDevices 

  Executable: Mssdk\Samples\Multimedia\DSound\Bin

User's Guide
============
  Select the playback and capture DirectSound device.  Press "Create"
  to simply create these devices.

Programming Notes
=================
  This sample was intended to be very simple, showing the basics how to 
  enumerate the DirectSound and DirectSoundCapture devices.
